name: My Little Planet VR
description:
Far away in another universe, the home planet of the little "Blops" has been destroyed... Two courageous Blops managed to escape in time and now try to find a viable planet. You are their guardian bunny and can make the difference between survival and death. Please help the little the Blops to rebuild their society in the game 'My Little Planet'! 

--- 

Functionality: 

  • Grab meteorites 
  • Create rain 
  • Move sun 
  • Protect the planet from meteorites 

--- 

HTC Vive + Trigger Button
